node.statement: CHAIN RULE FOR DISCRETE HILBERT TRANSFORM. Assuming Finite Subordination (node 1.5), let r = p boxplus_n q with roots nu_1 < ... < nu_n. Then: (a) There exist bijections sigma, tau : {1,...,n} -> {1,...,n} with omega_1(nu_k) = lambda_{sigma(k)}, omega_2(nu_k) = mu_{tau(k)}. (b) omega_1'(nu_k) = omega_2'(nu_k) = 1 for all k. (c) Defining alpha_k = omega_1''(nu_k)/2, beta_k = omega_2''(nu_k)/2: H_r(nu_k) = H_p(lambda_{sigma(k)}) - alpha_k = H_q(mu_{tau(k)}) - beta_k.
